Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

northlanderswordbillet.name: Northlander Sword Billet
northlanderswordbillet.description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords. 
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

ointmentofsight.name: Ointment of Sight
ointmentofsight.description:
Specialized refinement material for the Oathsworn Eye.
Special Deep Sea Unagi oil, which was once used to maintain Enkanomiya's sacred artifacts, has been carefully processed for the purpose of making this shining eye most bright indeed.

oldhandguard.name: Old Handguard
oldhandguard.description:
A battle-worn handguard that was once mounted on an Inazuman blade.
For those adept in the art of the sword, the tsuba is a defense from the edge of an opponent's blade. For beginners, it is a defense made for their own right hand, to protect it from itself.

ominousmask.name: Ominous Mask
ominousmask.description:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.
source: Dropped uncommonly by Lv. 60+ hilichurl archers

onikabuto.name: Onikabuto
onikabuto.description: A strange beetle that inhabits areas rich with Electro energy. Its docile and sedentary temperament could not be more different from the fierce, demonic visage displayed on its armored shell.

onion.name: Onion
onion.description: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

otogiwood.name: Otogi Wood
otogiwood.description:
Wood from the Otogi Tree. It has just the right amount of moisture and oil, and as such has a great many uses.
Can be used to create furnishings.

pepper.name: Pepper
pepper.description: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

perpetualheart.name: Perpetual Heart
perpetualheart.description:
The core that powers the autonomous movements of the Perpetual Mechanical Array.
Some theorize that the symbols on these cores have knowledge and logic inscribed upon them in a language that eyes cannot perceive. Some go a step further and believe that these unique Ruin machines autonomously decided to forsake a biomimetic form to pursue strength of function on account of their especially large cores and complex inscriptions.
source: Dropped by Lv. 30+ Perpetual Mechanical Arrays

philanemomushroom.name: Philanemo Mushroom
philanemomushroom.description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.
source: Found under the eaves of houses

philosophiesofballad.name: Philosophies of Ballad
philosophiesofballad.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.
philosophiesofballad.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Realm of Slumber

philosophiesofdiligence.name: Philosophies of Diligence
philosophiesofdiligence.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.
philosophiesofdiligence.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Heart of the Flames

philosophiesofelegance.name: Philosophies of Elegance
philosophiesofelegance.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance abhors vulgarity, and the elegant ever walk alone. Resisting base evils, unmoved by base loves, never taking refuge in base ignorance — that is how one perceives the chasm between the elegant and the contemptuous.

philosophiesoffreedom.name: Philosophies of Freedom
philosophiesoffreedom.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

philosophiesofgold.name: Philosophies of Gold
philosophiesofgold.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.
philosophiesofgold.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Circle of Embers

philosophiesoflight.name: Philosophies of Light
philosophiesoflight.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though they must live forever on the earth, humanity will always reach for the light. Mortals will pursue and surpass, and they will never stop. A sealed eternity may, perhaps, look magnificent, but its essence is death.

philosophiesofprosperity.name: Philosophies of Prosperity
philosophiesofprosperity.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.
philosophiesofprosperity.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Altar of Flames

philosophiesofresistance.name: Philosophies of Resistance
philosophiesofresistance.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

philosophiesoftransience.name: Philosophies of Transience
philosophiesoftransience.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?
philosophiesoftransience.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Reign of Violet

pieceofaerosiderite.name: Piece of Aerosiderite
pieceofaerosiderite.description:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Rumors of sea monsters are commonplace in Liyue, since the other shore is an unknown region that lies outside of Teyvat. Without the protection of The Seven, all that lies beyond is unknown chaos. Only power beyond the order of Teyvat is able to stain the power of Rex Lapis black.
pieceofaerosiderite.dropdomain: Domain of Forgery: Trial Grounds of Thunder

pinecone.name: Pinecone
pinecone.description: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

pinewood.name: Pine Wood
pinewood.description:
Timber obtained from pines. Its color and grain are nothing to write home about, but its unpretentious nature is elegant in its own right. The wood is very sturdy as well. In able hands, its products should be able to resist moth and rot alike.
Can be used to create furnishings.

plaustriteshard.name: Plaustrite Shard
plaustriteshard.description:
Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
A mysterious shard of elemental rock that can float by itself. It is the secret to the flying lanterns. It is also said to be the thing that powers the Jade Chamber's floating mechanism.
source: Found on Geovishap Hatchlings and Geovishaps

polarizingprism.name: Polarizing Prism
polarizingprism.description:
A prism that can bend light.
In the darkness, these prisms can spread thin light into a wider area. Perhaps this is due to this quirk that these prisms can grant a measure of peace to those whose hearts are oft shrouded in darkness.

potato.name: Potato
potato.description: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

primogem.name: Primogem
primogem.description: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

prithivatopazchunk.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
prithivatopazchunk.description:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

prithivatopazfragment.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
prithivatopazfragment.description:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

prithivatopazgemstone.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
prithivatopazgemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

pufferfish.name: Pufferfish
pufferfish.description:
Round and short pelvic fins, a plump body, and a plain face make up most people's first impression of the pufferfish. This is by and large an accurate assessment of its character as well: dull, slow, and lazy. However, few people know that this rather silly exterior hides a killer technique — this fish is capable of sucking water into its body before expelling it like a cannon from its mouth with such force and pinpoint accuracy that even fishermen might be stunned by it. Truly, it is a first-rate killer in the water.
"Pufferfish ahead? Watch for spittle!" — Angler's Atlas, Pufferfish Chapter

purpleshirakodai.name: Purple Shirakodai
purpleshirakodai.description:
A gentle, elegant butterflyfish variant. It has a lovely, streamlined dorsal fin, and has the nickname "Queen of the Waters."
Lovely purple patterns run across its body, and they love to swim together in schools to fend off natural dangers and predators. But once this quirk of theirs was grasped by seasoned fisherpeople, they realized that all one needed to do was to lure a single fish into the trap, and all the rest would follow.

pyrosigil.name: Pyro Sigil
pyrosigil.description: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

qingxin.name: Qingxin
qingxin.description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.
source: Found in the heights of stone forests
Recommendation: Found in Guyun Stone Forest

radish.name: Radish
radish.description: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

raimeiangelfish.name: Raimei Angelfish
raimeiangelfish.description:
A rare and valuable butterflyfish variant from Inazuma. It loves water bodies suffused with Electro, and seems to derive joy from electric currents.
It is said that these fish were once from the same line as the Abiding Angelfish of Liyue, until traveling merchants exported them to Inazuma. There, their behavioral patterns underwent an unexpected shift. At present, some researchers have begun to use them in conjunction with Electro Slimes for experiments.
"Ma... Mah... Mah tung ith numm..." — A certain greedy gourmet after trying a Raimei Angelfish dish.

rawmeat.name: Raw Meat
rawmeat.description: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

recruitsinsignia.name: Recruit's Insignia
recruitsinsignia.description: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.
source: Dropped uncommonly by Fatui Cicin Mages

reddye.name: Red Dye
reddye.description: Red dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

redrotbait.name: Redrot Bait
redrotbait.description:
Fish bait made from mixing Dendrobium and mashed meat. The unique rank sweetness of this bait spreads very quickly in the water, attracting fierce aquatic predators. Use with caution, however! Put too much of this bait down and you might hook in nastier customers than you bargained for!

Suitable for catching Sticklebacks, Bettas, Venomspine Fish, Akai Maou, and Snowstriders.

relicfromguyun.name: Relic from Guyun
relicfromguyun.description:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The stone spear has a glimmering core formed by the power of the defeated gods. Their hatred is not directed at Morax, however, for they have lost themselves a long time ago and are incapable of holding personal grudges.

rice.name: Rice
rice.description: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."
source: Sold at general goods shops in Liyue
Sold at general goods shops in Inazuma

riftbornregalia.name: Riftborn Regalia
riftbornregalia.description:
A broken horn that you obtained from defeating the Wolflord. That said, it should not have left anything behind after your hunt.
Even a lord among the Riftwolves is nothing before monsters of a higher pedigree.
"Gold" mass-produced these malformed wolf packs almost as if by accident, like shrunken drawings on discarded sheets of paper, and the horns on this one represent its authority to command its dark brood to dissolve space itself.

rimeworncrystal.name: Rime-Worn Crystal
rimeworncrystal.description:
Pieces of crystal obtained from monster habitats on Dragonspine.
They are only generated at special times.

rimewornfragment.name: Rime-Worn Fragment
rimewornfragment.description:
Small crystals obtained from monster habitats on Dragonspine.
They are only generated at special times.

ringofboreas.name: Ring of Boreas
ringofboreas.description:
A bit of crystallized ice from the Great Wolf King of the North.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. Though his power may have diminished, he could still freeze the land in an instant.
source: Lv. 70+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

runicfang.name: Runic Fang
runicfang.description:
A "fang" with which the mysterious, snakelike machine of old dug into mountains' depths. There are many ominous runes carved on it.
It is said that giant serpents lurk in the dark fissures deep beneath the ground. Burning with eternal resentment and malice toward the world above, they throw themselves into digging great tunnels, yet none know what their malicious purposes are...

rustykoi.name: Rusty Koi
rustykoi.description:
A large fish said to be the descendant of dragons.
This is a variant species of Koi, and is sometimes termed the "awakened dragon" amongst them. In stark contrast to its rather shabby appearance, the Rusty Koi has shed its opulent gold tabard in exchange for a hard armor of rusty bronze. Very strong-willed, it will fight any interloper that dares to steal its food or enter its territory. In terms of pure fighting capability, it is even a match for smaller sea monsters and has thus been given the nickname "Ironbone Dragon" in honor of its strength, which is considered the backbone of its species' future revitalization.

sakurabloom.name: Sakura Bloom
sakurabloom.description: Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.

salt.name: Salt
salt.description: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

sandbearerwood.name: Sandbearer Wood
sandbearerwood.description:
Timber from the Sandbearer Tree. Said to be an exceptionally hardy plant resistant to wind and rain with a long lifespan.
Can be used to create furnishings.

sangopearl.name: Sango Pearl
sangopearl.description: A precious pearl that grows in the coral of Watatsumi. Gives off a cool sheen like that of the moonlight.

sausage.name: Sausage
sausage.description: Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.

scatteredpieceofdecarabiansdream.name: Scattered Piece of Decarabian's Dream
scatteredpieceofdecarabiansdream.description:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but because the harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambition of the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.
He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of that dream are still mighty.
scatteredpieceofdecarabiansdream.dropdomain: Domain of Forgery: City of Reflections

seaganoderma.name: Sea Ganoderma
seaganoderma.description: A plant species that only grows in certain regions and islands of the ocean. Though it looks like a fungus of some sort, it actually comes from a substance secreted by certain soft-bodied organisms.

seagrass.name: Seagrass
seagrass.description: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

sealedscroll.name: Sealed Scroll
sealedscroll.description: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

sergeantsinsignia.name: Sergeant's Insignia
sergeantsinsignia.description: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.
source: Dropped uncommonly by Lv. 40+ Fatui Agents
Dropped uncommonly by Lv. 40+ Fatui Cicin Mages

shacklesofthedandeliongladiator.name: Shackles of the Dandelion Gladiator
shacklesofthedandeliongladiator.description:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Vennessa was not truly bound by her chains. If she had so wished, no ordinary physical constraints forged in Mondstadt could have held her, for the land there yielded no ore of exceptional quality, nor did it possess the divine flame of her ancestral home.
She was only bound by her responsibility to take care of her tribespeople.
shacklesofthedandeliongladiator.dropdomain: Domain of Forgery: Ruins of Thirsting Capital

shadowofthewarrior.name: Shadow of the Warrior
shadowofthewarrior.description:
A fragment of power that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is the product of a will to fight that has been honed over countless slaughters.
If humans do indeed have destinies, then his must surely have been twisted by such deeds. Why else, then, would he always be at the heart of every conflict?

shardofafoullegacy.name: Shard of a Foul Legacy
shardofafoullegacy.description:
The shard of a weapon that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is stained with a profound color that is not of this world, no doubt due to the land of endless darkness that the young boy saw with his own two eyes.
Perhaps it has nothing to do with the power of a Delusion, but as they say, the weapon reflects its user...

sharparrowhead.name: Sharp Arrowhead
sharparrowhead.description: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

shimmeringnectar.name: Shimmering Nectar
shimmeringnectar.description:
Nectar that is full of pure elemental energy.
Scholars generally concur that Whopperflowers are advanced life forms among the elemental plants, but there has yet to be a satisfactory explanation regarding their predatory habits.

shivadajadechunk.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
shivadajadechunk.description:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

shivadajadegemstone.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
shivadajadegemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

shrimpmeat.name: Shrimp Meat
shrimpmeat.description: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.
source: Sold at general goods shops in Liyue
Sold at general goods shops in Inazuma

silkenprint.name: Silken Print
silkenprint.description:
A prayer plaque that displays lovely Inazuman scenery, carved upon exquisite Yumemiru Wood in full color.
You can use Sub-Space Creation to imprint this elegant scene upon your Serenitea Pot...

silkflower.name: Silk Flower
silkflower.description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.
source: Found near Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor

silverlotus.name: Silver Lotus
silverlotus.description: A rare plant that grows on steep cliffs with nobility. Shines magnificently in the night.

silverraveninsignia.name: Silver Raven Insignia
silverraveninsignia.description: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

slimeconcentrate.name: Slime Concentrate
slimeconcentrate.description: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.

slimecondensate.name: Slime Condensate
slimecondensate.description: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

slimesecretions.name: Slime Secretions
slimesecretions.description: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

smalllampgrass.name: Small Lamp Grass
smalllampgrass.description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.
source: Found in the wild at night
Recommendation: Found in the Whispering Woods

smokedfowl.name: Smoked Fowl
smokedfowl.description: Fowl that has been smoked. The firmness of the meat gives new texture to dishes.

smolderingpearl.name: Smoldering Pearl
smolderingpearl.description:
A crystallization of a Pyro Hypostasis that constantly emits heat.
Even the burning flames shall one day grow cold, and even the ashen firewood can will itself back into a raging blaze. It must then be the will of the world that Pyro Hypostases should constantly cool down and heat up, much like the universe teems with endless life... until the fated darkness shall one day descend and bring it all to naught.

snapdragon.name: Snapdragon
snapdragon.description: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.
source: Found near lakes and river banks

snowstrider.name: Snowstrider
snowstrider.description:
A rare stickleback that only dwells in snowy, mountainous regions. It is quite possibly due to this that it has a much cooler temperament as compared to other sticklebacks. This species has a unusually great love for the bitter cold, almost as if they were parent and child. Though they can live in warmer waters, but any removal from such conditions is like striking a spiritual blow to them, and they will become depressed and refuse to multiply.
"Not a recommended catch." — Angler's Atlas, Snowstrider Chapter

spectralheart.name: Spectral Heart
spectralheart.description:
An energy core that allows the Specters to float.
These elemental life-forms have strange behavioral patterns and will periodically surge in number before disappearing.

spectralhusk.name: Spectral Husk
spectralhusk.description:
An energy core that allows the Specters to float. It contains a small amount of elemental energy.
Most of the rest has already dispersed.

spectralnucleus.name: Spectral Nucleus
spectralnucleus.description:
A complete energy core that can sometimes be found after defeating Specters.
There is a debate among those who just have to divide the world into winners and losers: what floats better — a Specter or an Anemo Slime?

spiritlocketofboreas.name: Spirit Locket of Boreas
spiritlocketofboreas.description:
A bit of the Great Wolf King of the North's power drawn from its soul.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. In his final moments, he finally realized the chilling north wind could only extinguish life, not nurture it. Therefore, Boreas let his powers freely flow into the land to protect it and its inhabitants.
source: Lv. 70+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

stainedmask.name: Stained Mask
stainedmask.description:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.
source: Dropped uncommonly by Lv. 40+ hilichurl archers

starconch.name: Starconch
starconch.description: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.
source: Found on the beaches of Liyue

starsilver.name: Starsilver
starsilver.description: A rare and precious ore formed by the unique geographical conditions and Ley Lines of Dragonspine.

stormbeads.name: Storm Beads
stormbeads.description:
Crackling Electro pearls left behind by the Thunder Manifestation.
It is said that Thunder Manifestations will only descend upon lands where powerful hatred dwells. The singers say that it is the unbearable disappointments and sufferings of life that drive them to forever wander the broken earth, unleashing sky-searing lightning as they go.

strangetooth.name: Strange Tooth
strangetooth.description: A Dragontooth you picked up in Dragonspine. Perhaps someone would know something more about it...

sturdyboneshard.name: Sturdy Bone Shard
sturdyboneshard.description:
A fragment of an unknown creature's bones that appear to be prized by Geovishaps for some reason.
The fragment appears to be quite aged. Despite being dragon-like beasts with no spoken language, they still seem to have some sort of special affection for these bone shards.

sugar.name: Sugar
sugar.description: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

sunsettia.name: Sunsettia
sunsettia.description: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

sweetflower.name: Sweet Flower
sweetflower.description: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

sweetflowermedaka.name: Sweet-Flower Medaka
sweetflowermedaka.description:
A lively, energetic fish famous for its petal-shaped tail.
It might be because this fish has a sweet tooth, but every bone in its body seems to serve as an antenna to seek out sweet treats. Following this absolute ideology, they swim through every creek and river in Teyvat in search of tasty sweets. True egalitarians, they will never reject any morsel, and certainly not because there's a hook attached. Have bait, will bite, as they say.
Beginner friendly.

tailofboreas.name: Tail of Boreas
tailofboreas.description:
A handful of tail scales from the Great Wolf King of the North.
Even without his physical body and beyond death, Boreas still possesses extraordinary powers. He took a form comprised of ice and wind to embrace a new challenge, but even such a form could not house all of his power. The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of their spiritual energy.
source: Lv. 70+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

teachingsofballad.name: Teachings of Ballad
teachingsofballad.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.
teachingsofballad.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Realm of Slumber

teachingsofdiligence.name: Teachings of Diligence
teachingsofdiligence.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Diligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.
teachingsofdiligence.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Heart of the Flames

teachingsofelegance.name: Teachings of Elegance
teachingsofelegance.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance brooks no flattery, and the elegant are ever noble. They are like the sea eagles who soar on high to contend with the resounding storms. They will not cater to philistine vulgarity, as one would not cast a flower crown into the mud, staining its dignity.

teachingsoffreedom.name: Teachings of Freedom
teachingsoffreedom.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

teachingsofgold.name: Teachings of Gold
teachingsofgold.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the blood that flows deep within Liyue's veins, the muscle that makes up Liyue's beating heart, and the bones that make Liyue stand proud.
teachingsofgold.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Circle of Embers

teachingsoflight.name: Teachings of Light
teachingsoflight.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
The ruler who claims to have perceived all forever aims to hoard celestial glory. But this vision that cannot be shared only leads people to long for it more fiercely, like moths diving into the flame.

teachingsofprosperity.name: Teachings of Prosperity
teachingsofprosperity.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the blessing of Liyue, it is the foundation of the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, and it is the source of the peace and safety of the land.
teachingsofprosperity.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Altar of Flames

teachingsofresistance.name: Teachings of Resistance
teachingsofresistance.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

teachingsoftransience.name: Teachings of Transience
teachingsoftransience.description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
Fleeting glories are the highest expression of mortal beauty, for are we mortals not like the flashing lightning itself? Like a lovely dream or blossoming spark, we shall leave a gorgeous mark on the eternal night sky.
teachingsoftransience.dropdomain: Domain of Mastery: Reign of Violet

teacoloredshirakodai.name: Tea-Colored Shirakodai
teacoloredshirakodai.description:
A gentle, elegant butterflyfish variant. It has a lovely, streamlined dorsal fin, and has the nickname "Queen of the Waters."
Tea-colored patterns swirl around this inquisitive fish that seems strongly interested in everything around it. Unfortunately, its method of expressing interest in anything is to have a nibble to see if it can be eaten. This isn't a malicious move by any means, but it has landed this species in hot water many times all the same.

tearsofthecalamitousgod.name: Tears of the Calamitous God
tearsofthecalamitousgod.description:
A puppet joint obtained from the Plane of Euthymia. The gesture here is in the shape of the baleful Eye of Stormy Judgment.
Since they are able to bring down curse and catastrophe alike with a mere gaze, it might seem natural to blame life's misfortunes on calamitous deities. However, if you think about it a little harder, if your will is strong enough, and if your convictions are firm enough...
The catastrophes go on for too long. Even a baleful gaze must wash itself with tears.
source: Lv. 70+ Guardian of Eternity Challenge Reward

themeaningofaeons.name: The Meaning of Aeons
themeaningofaeons.description:
A small piece of headgear obtained once the dust settled in the Plane of Euthymia.
One thought may end all calamity, and there will always be thoughts that may transcend time.
Amid all this, one wonders if Makoto's true meaning was successfully communicated or not.
source: Lv. 70+ Guardian of Eternity Challenge Reward

thevisiblewinds.name: "The Visible Winds"
thevisiblewinds.description:
Specialized refinement material for the Windblume Ode.
An intricately-made ornament that symbolizes the windmills and windblumes, and is that which adorns the limbs of the Windblume Ode. The wind is invisible and intangible, but the windmills that keep turning and the swaying flowers in the emerald fields are "the visible winds" that show people that the breeze will always care for all life in Mondstadt.

tileofdecarabianstower.name: Tile of Decarabian's Tower
tileofdecarabianstower.description:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.
tileofdecarabianstower.dropdomain: Domain of Forgery: City of Reflections
source: Purchase from the Souvenir Shop in Mondstadt

tofu.name: Tofu
tofu.description: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.
source: Sold at general goods shops in Liyue
Sold at general goods shops in Inazuma

tomato.name: Tomato
tomato.description: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

treasurehoarderinsignia.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
treasurehoarderinsignia.description: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

tuskofmonoceroscaeli.name: Tusk of Monoceros Caeli
tuskofmonoceroscaeli.description:
The horn of a whale that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is said that the shape of one's constellation determines one's character. The image of a whale cruising across the celestial heights represents a solipsism that seeks to crush and devour all in its path.
Embracing this aspect of himself, Childe gleefully summoned one such beast before throwing himself into battle against you.

unagimeat.name: Unagi Meat
unagimeat.description: The fresh meat of an Unagi. If handled properly, it can be used to make fresh, lovely food.

vajradaamethystchunk.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
vajradaamethystchunk.description:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

vajradaamethystfragment.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
vajradaamethystfragment.description:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

vajradaamethystgemstone.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
vajradaamethystgemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

valberry.name: Valberry
valberry.description: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the storm watchers' only solace was the sweetness of this fruit and hope for the city's peace.

varunadalazuritechunk.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
varunadalazuritechunk.description:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

varunadalazuritefragment.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
varunadalazuritefragment.description:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

varunadalazuritegemstone.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
varunadalazuritegemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

vayudaturquoisechunk.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
vayudaturquoisechunk.description:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

vayudaturquoisefragment.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
vayudaturquoisefragment.description:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

vayudaturquoisegemstone.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
vayudaturquoisegemstone.description:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

venomspinefish.name: Venomspine Fish
venomspinefish.description:
A swift, fierce fish with spiny fins whose spiny mouth can pierce the current when it swims at full speed. Its capabilities have earned it the nicknames "The Cutter" and "Hard-To-Get."
The Venomspine Fish's most well-known trait is its poisonous spines, which contain a neurotoxin that is fatal to smaller prey but proves far weaker against large organisms, mostly only causing mild confusion or hallucinations.
"Fill 'er up, Rex, my good lad! Fill 'er up to the brim for big brother!" — A certain fisherman from Liyue who was accidentally pricked.

vialofadeptalspeed.name: Vial of Adeptal Speed
vialofadeptalspeed.description: A small bottle that seals some adeptal energy within. Will immediately complete a furnishing when used.

violetgrass.name: Violetgrass
violetgrass.description: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

vitalizeddragontooth.name: Vitalized Dragontooth
vitalizeddragontooth.description: A Dragontooth infused with vitality. Just its luster and texture are enough to make one uneasy...

wanderersadvice.name: Wanderer's Advice
wanderersadvice.description:
Character EXP material. Gives 1000 EXP.
These experiences are still beneficial even if one does not live in Teyvat.

weatheredarrowhead.name: Weathered Arrowhead
weatheredarrowhead.description:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

wheat.name: Wheat
wheat.description: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

whiteironchunk.name: White Iron Chunk
whiteironchunk.description: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

whopperflowernectar.name: Whopperflower Nectar
whopperflowernectar.description:
Nectar extracted from the stamen of a Whopperflower that contains trace amounts of elemental energy.
The taste of the nectar has a hint of Sweet Flower in it.

wickmaterial.name: Wick Material
wickmaterial.description:
Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
The commonly encountered velvety material can be processed into lantern wicks so the lanterns can float away, carrying their beautiful wishes far afield.

wildernessrod.name: Wilderness Rod
wildernessrod.description: A rather pedestrian-looking wooden fishing rod. Apart from being quite sturdy, even to point where you could use it for self-defense, it lacks any sort of special features. But the old adage holds true — "the novice's rod shall be the tent-pole of their veterancy." Even the greatest of anglers must surely have started with this simple implement.

windtangler.name: Windtangler
windtangler.description:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Mondstadt.

A long, bright, transparent rod created by a poet from Mondstadt. To help borrow the power of Anemo to help raise the rod, the poet rather ingeniously designed a fishing reel made from the leaves of Windwheel Asters, which also imparts a certain romanticism of "lingering in the wind" to this device. But perhaps there were issues in the handiwork or in the design itself, for the finalized product could not spin as freely as expected. Perhaps this is what they call "the chasm between professions?"
source: Exchange at the Mondstadt Fishing Association

windwheelaster.name: Windwheel Aster
windwheelaster.description: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds."
source: Found near the Statue of The Seven at Windrise
Found under trees in the wild

wishmaker.name: Wishmaker
wishmaker.description:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Liyue.

A long rod that stands like elegant bamboo. It is said to have been constructed and kept by a skilled hermit from Liyue, and it was first discovered on a stone tablet with the following words carved upon it: "O you who aspire, take up this rod," like a legendary sword waiting for a hero to pull it out. Of course, you only ever hear this glorious origin story from the mouths of merchants, so it may just be some rhetoric used to increase the item's value... But those who know this and still use this rod can only be those who are ready and willing to accept this pact.
source: Exchange at the Liyue Fishing Association

wolfhook.name: Wolfhook
wolfhook.description: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

yellowdye.name: Yellow Dye
yellowdye.description: Yellow dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

yumemiruwood.name: Yumemiru Wood
yumemiruwood.description:
Timber obtained from Sakura Trees. Exquisite in quality and full of moisture, people say that it can lull people into dreams as sweet as the warm spring.
Can be used to create furnishings.

c1.name: Flower of Eden
c1.effect: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

c2.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
c2.effect:
Transient Blossoms generated by **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
·Unleashing **Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide** consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
·This effect stacks up to 4 times.

c3.name: Grace of Helios
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Descent of Divinity
c4.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

c5.name: Tide of Hadean
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dust of Purification
c6.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

c1.name: Star of Another World
c1.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c2.name: Star of Another World
c2.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c3.name: Star of Another World
c3.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c4.name: Star of Another World
c4.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c5.name: Star of Another World
c5.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c6.name: Star of Another World
c6.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c1.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
c1.effect: Fires 2 arrows per **Aimed Shot**. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

c2.name: Bunny Triggered
c2.effect:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

c3.name: It Burns!
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Fiery Rain** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
c4.effect: Decreases **Explosive Puppet**'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

c5.name: It's Baron Bunny!
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Explosive Puppet** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Wildfire
c6.effect: **Fiery Rain** increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

c1.name: Stay a While and Listen Up
c1.effect: After using **Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!**, Arataki Itto gains 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength. After 1s, Itto will gain 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength every 0.5s for 1.5s.

c2.name: Gather 'Round, It's a Brawl!
c2.effect:
After using **Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!**, each party member whose Element is Geo will decrease that skill's CD by 1.5s and restore 6 Energy to Arataki Itto.
CD can be decreased by up to 4.5s in this manner. Max 18 Energy can be restored in this manner.

c3.name: Horns Lowered, Coming Through
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Jailhouse Bread and Butter
c4.effect: When the Raging Oni King state caused by **Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!** ends, all nearby party members gain 20% DEF and 20% ATK for 10s.

c5.name: 10 Years of Hanamizaka Fame
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Arataki Itto, Present!
c6.effect: Arataki Itto's Charged Attacks deal +70% Crit DMG. Additionally, when he uses Arataki Kesagiri, he has a 50% chance to not consume stacks of Superlative Superstrength.

c1.name: Gleeful Songs
c1.effect: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

c2.name: Vitality Burst
c2.effect:
Decreases the CD of **Let the Show Begin♪** by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

c3.name: Star of Tomorrow
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Shining Miracle♪** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attentiveness be My Power
c4.effect:
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

c5.name: The Purest Companionship
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Let the Show Begin♪** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dedicating Everything to You
c6.effect:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

c1.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
c1.effect:
When **Stormbreaker** is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

c2.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
c2.effect: **Stormbreaker**'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

c3.name: Summoner of Storm
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Tidecaller** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Stunning Revenge
c4.effect: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% Electro DMG for 10s.

c5.name: Crimson Tidewalker
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Stormbreaker** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Bane of Evil
c6.effect: During the duration of **Stormbreaker**, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

c1.name: Grand Expectation
c1.effect: **Fantastic Voyage**'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

c2.name: Impasse Conqueror
c2.effect: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

c3.name: Unstoppable Fervor
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Passion Overload** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Unexpected Odyssey
c4.effect:
Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of **Passion Overload**'s Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

c5.name: True Explorer
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Fantastic Voyage** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Fire Ventures With Me
c6.effect: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside **Fantastic Voyage**'s radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

c1.name: Ice Unleashed
c1.effect: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

c2.name: Atmospheric Revolution
c2.effect: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by **Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost** have their CD time decreased by 15%.

c3.name: Cloudburst
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Skies
c4.effect:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

c5.name: The True Path
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rally of Four Blades
c6.effect:
**Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star** deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

c1.name: Conviction
c1.effect: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

c2.name: Searing Ember
c2.effect:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

c3.name: Fire and Steel
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Searing Onslaught** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Flowing Flame
c4.effect:
Casting **Searing Onslaught** in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
2s after casting **Searing Onslaught**, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

c5.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dawn** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
c6.effect:
After casting **Searing Onslaught**, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

c1.name: A Lingering Flavor
c1.effect: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of **Signature Mix** end.

c2.name: Shaken, Not Purred
c2.effect:
Increases **Icy Paws**' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the **Icy Paws** shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

c3.name: A—Another Round?
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Signature Mix** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wine Industry Slayer
c4.effect: Within the radius of **Signature Mix**, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

c5.name: Double Shot, on the Rocks
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Icy Paws** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
c6.effect:
Characters within **Signature Mix**'s radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
·Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
·Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

c1.name: Tidal Illusion
c1.effect:
Every time **Icetide Vortex**'s Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

c2.name: Lady of Seafoam
c2.effect: Decreases the CD of **Icetide Vortex**'s Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Press CD.

c3.name: Lawrence Pedigree
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Glacial Illumination** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
c4.effect: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

c5.name: Chivalric Quality
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Icetide Vortex** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Noble Obligation
c6.effect: Lightfall Swords created by **Glacial Illumination** start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

c1.name: Gaze of the Deep
c1.effect: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

c2.name: Devourer of All Sins
c2.effect: When **Nightrider** is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

c3.name: Wings of Nightmare
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Nightrider** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
c4.effect:
When **Midnight Phantasmagoria** is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents.
When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

c5.name: Against the Fleeing Light
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Midnight Phantasmagoria** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Evernight Raven
c6.effect: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

c1.name: Dew-Drinker
c1.effect:
Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrows or Frostflake Arrow Blooms decrease opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s upon hit.
A hit also regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hits the target.

c2.name: The Auspicious
c2.effect: **Trail of the Qilin** gains 1 additional charge.

c3.name: Cloud-Strider
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Celestial Shower** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Westward Sojourn
c4.effect:
Opponents standing within the AoE of **Celestial Shower** take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

c5.name: The Merciful
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Trail of the Qilin** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Clement
c6.effect: Using **Trail of the Qilin** causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

c1.name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
c1.effect:
When characters (other than Gorou) within the AoE of Gorou's **General's War Banner** or **General's Glory** deal Geo DMG to opponents, the CD of Gorou's **Inuzaka All-Round Defense** is decreased by 2s.
This effect can occur once every 10s.

c2.name: Sitting Hound: Steady as a Clock
c2.effect:
While **General's Glory** is in effect, its duration is extended by 1s when a nearby active character obtains an Elemental Shard from a Crystallize reaction. 
This effect can occur once every 0.1s. Max extension is 3s.

c3.name: Mauling Hound: Fierce as Fire
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Inuzaka All-Round Defense** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Lapping Hound: Warm as Water
c4.effect: When **General's Glory** is in the "Impregnable" or "Crunch" states, it will also heal active characters within its AoE by 50% of Gorou's own DEF every 1.5s.

c5.name: Striking Hound: Thunderous Force
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Juuga: Forward Unto Victory** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty
c6.effect:
For 12s after using **Inuzaka All-Round Defense** or **Juuga: Forward Unto Victory**, increases the CRIT DMG of all nearby party members' Geo DMG based on the buff level of the skill's field at the time of use:
· "Standing Firm": +10%
· "Impregnable": +20%
· "Crunch": +40%

This effect cannot stack and will take reference from the last instance of the effect that is triggered.

c1.name: Crimson Bouquet
c1.effect: While in a **Paramita Papilio** state activated by **Guide to Afterlife**, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

c2.name: Ominous Rainfall
c2.effect:
Increases the **Blood Blossom** DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.
Additionally, **Spirit Soother** will also apply the **Blood Blossom** effect.

c3.name: Lingering Carmine
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Guide to Afterlife** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
c4.effect: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a **Blood Blossom** that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

c5.name: Floral Incense
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit Soother** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Butterfly's Embrace
c6.effect:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

c1.name: Spiraling Tempest
c1.effect: Increases the pulling speed of **Gale Blade** after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

c2.name: People's Aegis
c2.effect: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

c3.name: When the West Wind Arises
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dandelion Breeze** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Lands of Dandelion
c4.effect: Within the Field created by **Dandelion Breeze**, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

c5.name: Outbursting Gust
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Gale Blade** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
c6.effect: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by **Dandelion Breeze**. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

c1.name: Scarlet Hills
c1.effect:
Decreases **Chihayaburu**'s CD by 10%.
Using **Kazuha Slash** resets the CD of **Chihayaburu**.

c2.name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
c2.effect:
The Autumn Whirlwind field created by **Kazuha Slash** has the following effects:
· Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200 for its duration.
· Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

c3.name: Maple Monogatari
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Chihayaburu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Oozora Genpou
c4.effect:
When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
·Pressing or Holding **Chihayaburu** regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
·When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

c5.name: Wisdom of Bansei
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kazuha Slash** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Crimson Momiji
c6.effect: After using **Chihayaburu** or **Kazuha Slash**, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an Anemo Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks by 0.2%.

c1.name: Excellent Blood
c1.effect: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c2.name: Never-Ending Performance
c2.effect: Every time **Glacial Waltz** defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

c3.name: Dance of Frost
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Frostgnaw** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Kiss
c4.effect:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

c5.name: Frostbiting Embrace
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Glacial Waltz** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Glacial Whirlwind
c6.effect: **Glacial Waltz** will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

c1.name: Snowswept Sakura
c1.effect: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of **Kamisato Art: Hyouka** by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

c2.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
c2.effect: When casting **Kamisato Art: Soumetsu**, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

c3.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Soumetsu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Ebb and Flow
c4.effect: Opponents damaged by **Kamisato Art: Soumetsu**'s Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

c5.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Hyouka** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dance of Suigetsu
c6.effect: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.

c1.name: Kyouka Fuushi
c1.effect: **Shunsuiken** DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

c2.name: World Source
c2.effect: **Namisen**'s maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.

c3.name: To Admire the Flowers
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Kyouka** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Endless Flow
c4.effect: After using **Kamisato Art: Suiyuu**, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.

c5.name: Bansui Ichiro
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Suiyuu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Boundless Origin
c6.effect:
After using **Kamisato Art: Kyouka**, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
Both these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.

c1.name: Thundering Might
c1.effect: Recasting **Stellar Restoration** while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

c2.name: Keen Extraction
c2.effect:
When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c3.name: Foreseen Reformation
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Starward Sword** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attunement
c4.effect: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

c5.name: Beckoning Stars
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Stellar Restoration** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Tenacious Star
c6.effect:
When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s.
Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

c1.name: Chained Reactions
c1.effect: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of **Sparks 'n' Splash**'s DMG.

c2.name: Explosive Frags
c2.effect: Being hit by **Jumpy Dumpty**'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

c3.name: Exquisite Compound
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Jumpy Dumpty** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Sparkly Explosion
c4.effect: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of **Sparks 'n' Splash**, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

c5.name: Nova Burst
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sparks 'n' Splash** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Blazing Delight
c6.effect:
While under the effects of **Sparks 'n' Splash**, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When **Sparks 'n' Splash** is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

c1.name: Crow's Eye
c1.effect:
When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of **Tengu Stormcall** is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

c2.name: Dark Wings
c2.effect: Unleashing **Tengu Stormcall** will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

c3.name: The War Within
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Subjugation: Koukou Sendou** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Conclusive Proof
c4.effect: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by **Subjugation: Koukou Sendou** is increased to 6.

c5.name: Spellsinger
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Tengu Stormcall** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Sin of Pride
c6.effect: The Electro DMG of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.

c1.name: To Cloister Compassion
c1.effect: **Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite**'s AoE is increased by 50%.

c2.name: To Forsake Fortune
c2.effect: **Grass Ring of Sanctification**'s duration is increased by 3s.

c3.name: To Sequester Sorrow
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sanctifying Ring** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: To Sever Sealing
c4.effect:
When the Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks of the character affected by Shinobu's **Grass Ring of Sanctification** hit opponents, a Thundergrass Mark will land on the opponent's position and deal AoE Electro DMG based on 9.7% of Shinobu's Max HP.
This effect can occur once every 5s.

c5.name: To Cease Courtesies
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: To Ward Weakness
c6.effect:
When Kuki Shinobu takes lethal DMG, this instance of DMG will not take her down. This effect will automatically trigger when her HP reaches 1 and will trigger once every 60s.
When Shinobu's HP drops below 25%, she will gain 150 Elemental Mastery for 15s. This effect will trigger once every 60s.

c1.name: Infinite Circuit
c1.effect:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding **Violet Arc**.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

c2.name: Electromagnetic Field
c2.effect:
Holding **Violet Arc** has the following effects:
·Increases DEF by 25%.
·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

c3.name: Resonant Thunder
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Lightning Rose** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Plasma Eruption
c4.effect: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by **Lightning Rose** by 1-3.

c5.name: Electrocute
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Violet Arc** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Pulsating Witch
c6.effect:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of **Violet Arc**'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c1.name: Prophecy of Submersion
c1.effect:
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s:
·Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%.
·Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
·Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
·Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

c2.name: Lunar Chain
c2.effect:
When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c3.name: Restless Revolution
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Stellaris Phantasm** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
c4.effect: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

c5.name: Mockery of Fortuna
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Mirror Reflection of Doom** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
c6.effect:
Upon entering **Illusory Torrent**, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.
A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

c1.name: Piercing Fragments
c1.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

c2.name: Shock Effect
c2.effect:
When **Jade Screen** is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

c3.name: Majesty Be the Array of Stars
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Starshatter** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
c4.effect: **Jade Screen** increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

c5.name: Invincible Be the Jade Screen
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Jade Screen** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Grandeur Be the Seven Stars
c6.effect: When **Starshatter** is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

c1.name: I Got Your Back
c1.effect: While **Sweeping Time** and **Breastplate** are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

c2.name: Combat Maid
c2.effect: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

c3.name: Invulnerable Maid
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Breastplate** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: To Be Cleaned
c4.effect: When **Breastplate**'s duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding opponents.

c5.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sweeping Time** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Must Be Spotless
c6.effect:
**Sweeping Time** increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

c1.name: Ascetics of Frost
c1.effect: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

c2.name: Frozen to the Bone
c2.effect: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c3.name: Ascendant Praise
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Divine Suppression
c4.effect: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

c5.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rite of Resurrection
c6.effect:
Using **Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune** revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

c1.name: Ominous Inscription
c1.effect: **Chakra Desiderata** will gather Resolve even faster. When Electro characters use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 80%. When characters of other Elemental Types use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 20%.

c2.name: Steelbreaker
c2.effect: While using Musou no Hitotachi and in the Musou Isshin state applied by **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu**, the Raiden Shogun's attacks ignore 60% of opponents' DEF.

c3.name: Shinkage Bygones
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Pledge of Propriety
c4.effect: When the **Musou Isshin** state applied by **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu** expires, all nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun) gain 30% bonus ATK for 10s.

c5.name: Shogun's Descent
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Transcendence: Baleful Omen** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Wishbearer
c6.effect:
While in the **Musou Isshin** state applied by **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu**, attacks by the Raiden Shogun that are considered part of her Elemental Burst will decrease all nearby party members' (not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.
This effect can trigger once every 1s and can trigger a total of 5 times during Musou Isshin's duration.

c1.name: Wolf's Instinct
c1.effect: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

c2.name: Suppression
c2.effect: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

c3.name: Soul Companion
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Lightning Fang** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Bite
c4.effect: When casting **Claw and Thunder** (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

c5.name: Sharpened Claws
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Claw and Thunder** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Lupus Fulguris
c6.effect:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG.
When Razor is not using **Lightning Fang**, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for **Claw and Thunder**.

c1.name: Unholy Revelation
c1.effect: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

c2.name: Land Without Promise
c2.effect: The duration of the Ice Lance created by **Rites of Termination** is increased by 4s.

c3.name: The Wages of Sin
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Ravaging Confession** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Painful Grace
c4.effect:
**Ravaging Confession**'s CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

c5.name: Last Rites
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Rites of Termination** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Divine Retribution
c6.effect: **Rites of Termination**'s attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

c1.name: At Water's Edge
c1.effect:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by **Nereid's Ascension**, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as Hydro DMG.
This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

c2.name: The Clouds Like Waves Rippling
c2.effect:
Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
·**Kurage's Oath** Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
·**Nereid's Ascension** Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

c3.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
c3.effect:

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
combat2.info:
Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.

**Solar Isotoma**
has the following properties:
·When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF. 
·Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.
·When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
·Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct. Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time. 

**Hold** to designate the location of the skill.
combat2.description: This Geo bloom has an unusual property mirrored in the aim of alchemy. To rise from the earth, soar into the sky, and become the sun.

combat3.name: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
combat3.info:
Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG.

Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.
combat3.description: Under the Kreideprinz's command, the tectonic tide of creation seethes into life.

passive1.name: Calcite Might
passive1.info: Transient Blossoms generated by **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

passive2.name: Homuncular Nature
passive2.info: Using **Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide** increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

passive3.name: Flash of Genius
passive3.info: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Rapid Fire
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.

**Charged Attack**
Perform a more precise **Aimed Shot** with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.

**Plunging Attack**
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Frozen Wilds
combat2.info:
Aloy throws a Freeze Bomb in the targeted direction that explodes on impact, dealing Cryo DMG. After it explodes, the Freeze Bomb will split up into many Chillwater Bomblets that explode on contact with opponents or after a short delay, dealing Cryo DMG.
When a Freeze Bomb or Chillwater Bomblet hits an opponent, the opponent's ATK is decreased and Aloy receives 1 Coil stack.
Aloy can gain up to 1 Coil stack every 0.1s.

**Coil**
·Each stack increases Aloy's Normal Attack DMG.
·When Aloy has 4 Coil stacks, all stacks of Coil are cleared. She then enters the Rushing Ice state, which further increases the DMG dealt by her Normal Attacks and converts her Normal Attack DMG to Cryo DMG.

While in the Rushing Ice state, Aloy cannot obtain new Coil stacks.
Coil effects will be cleared 30s after Aloy leaves the field.
combat2.description: You think that's cold? Guess you've never been to The Cut.

labels: Rushing Ice Normal Attack DMG Bonus|{param8:F1P}

combat3.name: Prophecies of Dawn
combat3.info: Aloy throws a Power Cell filled with Cryo in the targeted direction, then detonates it with an arrow, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
combat3.description: Whether "Zero Dawn" referred to hope or extinction no longer matters. Aloy has already saved her world, and the fate of this one is still being forged by its own heroes.

passive1.name: Combat Override
passive1.info: When Aloy receives the Coil effect from **Frozen Wilds**, her ATK is increased by 16%, while nearby party members' ATK is increased by 8%. This effect lasts 10s.

passive2.name: Strong Strike
