As long as you believe in the path you are walking, then everything you encounter on your journey will be a source of happiness.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Gorou

hutaospiritsoother.name: Hu Tao: Spirit Soother
hutaospiritsoother.description:
Namecard style.
Director Hu Tao isn't scary at all. Probably.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Hu Tao

inazumaeagleplume.name: Inazuma: Eagleplume
inazumaeagleplume.description:
Namecard style.
Pirka chikappo! Kapatcir kamuy!
source: Reward for completing all achievements under "The Chronicles of the Sea of Fog "

inazumakamisatocrest.name: Inazuma: Kamisato Crest
inazumakamisatocrest.description:
Namecard style.
This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan.

inazumakujouinsignia.name: Inazuma: Kujou Insignia
inazumakujouinsignia.description:
Namecard style.
This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Tenryou Commission's Kujou Clan.
source: Reward for completing all achievements under "Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity"

inazumaraidenemblem.name: Inazuma: Raiden Emblem
inazumaraidenemblem.description:
Namecard style.
This is the emblem of the Ogosho Shogun, and is the banner of her troops, the Electro Mitsudomoe.

inazumasacredsakura.name: Inazuma: Sacred Sakura
inazumasacredsakura.description:
Namecard style.
Wherever the sakura petals fall, there the protection of the sacred tree rests.

inazumasangonomiyacrest.name: Inazuma: Sangonomiya Crest
inazumasangonomiyacrest.description:
Namecard style.
This is the emblem of the Sangonomiya Clan, the leaders of Watatsumi's people.
source: Reward for completing all achievements under "Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II."

inazumatokoyo.name: Inazuma: Tokoyo
inazumatokoyo.description:
Namecard style.
"O Mighty Sun! What use are your heat and light if you cannot own all that they survey?"
source: Reward for completing all achievements under "The Light of Day"

ittooniface.name: Itto: Oni Face
ittooniface.description:
Namecard style.
A real man puts sorrow and anger behind him and smiles brightly for the world to see!
source: Reward for reaching Friendship Lv. 10 with Itto

jeanthewindscourse.name: Jean: The Winds' Course
jeanthewindscourse.description:
Namecard style.
The dandelion, also called "lion's fang" by some, is the flower most sensitive to the direction of the wind.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Jean

kaedeharakazuhaautumnmapleviewing.name: Kaedehara Kazuha: Autumn Maple-Viewing
kaedeharakazuhaautumnmapleviewing.description:
Namecard style.
"The pine-song ripples as red leaves billow."
source: Reward for reaching Friendship Lv. 10 with Kaedehara Kazuha

kaeyapavoocellus.name: Kaeya: Pavo Ocellus
kaeyapavoocellus.description:
Namecard style.
The pattern of peacock feathers resembles eyes that never shut. Can we really say that this Pavo Ocellus is missing an eye...?
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Kaeya

kamisatoayakafoldingfan.name: Kamisato Ayaka: Folding Fan
kamisatoayakafoldingfan.description:
Namecard style.
Ayaka does constantly change out the fans she carries with her, of course. If you're buying her some as gifts, remember not to send summer fans or throwing fans. Dancing fans or tea fans are good choices, though.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Ayaka

kamisatoayatoripple.name: Kamisato Ayato: Ripple
kamisatoayatoripple.description:
Namecard style.
The camellia alights upon the mirrored pond, sending ripples throughout the water.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Kamisato Ayato

keqinglightningstiletto.name: Keqing: Lightning Stiletto
keqinglightningstiletto.description:
Namecard style.
It was originally invented to just test out one's surroundings and climb to high places, really...
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Keqing

kleeexplosive.name: Klee: Explosive
kleeexplosive.description:
Namecard style.
Klee's lucky explosive — can you tell if it's Jumpy Dumpty or Dodoco? (Hint: Look carefully at the tail...)
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Klee

kujousaratengu.name: Kujou Sara: Tengu
kujousaratengu.description:
Namecard style.
Kujou Sara may have forsaken the arrogant life of the tengu race, but she has never neglected their brilliance with the sword or their supernatural might.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Kujou Sara

kukishinobunet.name: Kuki Shinobu: Net
kukishinobunet.description:
Namecard style.
"You know those Naku Weed rings they have in Inazuma? You know, the kind that can drive out evil? Shinobu got the idea that since wicked things won't cross their boundaries willingly, we could make them into items that could be actively used. Ah, her talent for being a shrine maiden truly is frightening..."
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Kuki Shinobu

lisatempusfugit.name: Lisa: Tempus Fugit
lisatempusfugit.description:
Namecard style.
An hourglass marks the end of the work day for Lisa. Its sand moves fast.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Lisa

liyueathousandships.name: Liyue: A Thousand Ships
liyueathousandships.description:
Namecard style.
Many boats have been numbered by day and night.

liyueintheclouds.name: Liyue: In the Clouds
liyueintheclouds.description:
Namecard style.
The peaks adorn the clouded moon.

liyuestillnessofstone.name: Liyue: Stillness of Stone
liyuestillnessofstone.description:
Namecard style.
Witness the lonely, cloud-covered peaks of Liyue.
source: Reward for completing all achievements under "Liyue: The Harbor of Stone and Contracts"

lumensstoneoflight.name: Lumens: Stone of Light
lumensstoneoflight.description:
Namecard style.
What flows within this nameless, voiceless azure crystal? The secrets of the heavens? Or the whispers of the abyss?
source: Reward for enhancing the Lumenstone Adjuvant to Lv. 10

monastarrysky.name: Mona: Starry Sky
monastarrysky.description:
Namecard style.
A girl gazes down at the stars' reflection on the water, pondering the joys and sorrows of life.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Mona

mondstadtblessing.name: Mondstadt: Blessing
mondstadtblessing.description:
Namecard style.
They who have it in their hearts to bless others shall themselves be blessed.

mondstadtherosfame.name: Mondstadt: Hero's Fame
mondstadtherosfame.description:
Namecard style.
The name of the Honorary Knight has spread far and wide among the citizenry.

mondstadtwhistlingwind.name: Mondstadt: Whistling Wind
mondstadtwhistlingwind.description:
Namecard style.
Listen to the singing of Mondstadt's birds and winds.
source: Reward for completing all achievements under "Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song"

ningguangphoenix.name: Ningguang: Phoenix
ningguangphoenix.description:
Namecard style.
They say that "more's the pity that phoenixes are few." But seriously, one Ningguang is more than enough...
source: Reward for reaching Friendship Lv. 10 with Ningguang

noelleprotector.name: Noelle: Protector
noelleprotector.description:
Namecard style.
Noelle is quite special. Noelle won't let any harm come to you.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Noelle

qiqicoldstorage.name: Qiqi: Cold Storage
qiqicoldstorage.description:
Namecard style.
What should be kept in the fridge? Dr. Baizhu's herbs, coconut milk... and Hu Tao.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Qiqi

raidenshogunenlightenment.name: Raiden Shogun: Enlightenment
raidenshogunenlightenment.description:
Namecard style.
Not simply Ei, and not merely the Raiden Shogun. Observe yourself also with one stormy eye, and you will someday reach a breakthrough.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with the Raiden Shogun

razorwolvensprint.name: Razor: Wolvensprint
razorwolvensprint.description:
Namecard style.
It's quite a sight to behold Razor and the wolves prepare their dinner, but they won't let Klee or the Traveler see the slightly gruesome affair.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Razor

rosariaindenture.name: Rosaria: Indenture
rosariaindenture.description:
Namecard style.
The unselfish warmth and goodwill of the people is, to her, a kindness that she must repay, and so it is an indenture that follows her forever.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Rosaria

sangonomiyakokomithedeep.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi: The Deep
sangonomiyakokomithedeep.description:
Namecard style.
All Watatsumi islanders know this tale: that deep beneath the waves lies their former home.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Sangonomiya Kokomi

sayumujimujidaruma.name: Sayu: Muji-Muji Daruma
sayumujimujidaruma.description:
Namecard style.
It is even smaller than Sayu, sure, but it can help her do the things she doesn't want to do.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Sayu

shenhecomb.name: Shenhe: Comb
shenhecomb.description:
Namecard style.
The early onset of white hair is often correlated to one's sorrows. Since "comb" and "scatter" are similarly read in Liyue's language, they believe that combing one's hair is the same as scattering one's misfortunes
source: Reward for reaching Friendship Lv. 10 with Shenhe

sucrosebioalchemy.name: Sucrose: Bio-Alchemy
sucrosebioalchemy.description:
Namecard style.
If you closely examine an Anemo Hypostasis before it disappears, you will discover that they are actually quite square.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Sucrose

thomablazingguard.name: Thoma: Blazing Guard
thomablazingguard.description:
Namecard style.
Blazing armor, flaming guards.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Thoma

travelnotesawakening.name: Travel Notes: Awakening
travelnotesawakening.description:
Namecard style.
The three realms quake, heaven and earth awaken. The Sangacorexes, too, rise again from their eternal slumber.

travelnotescatchthewind.name: Travel Notes: Catch the Wind
travelnotescatchthewind.description:
Namecard style.
The most difficult part of writing a travel journal is coming up with the beginning.

travelnoteschalk.name: Travel Notes: Chalk
travelnoteschalk.description:
Namecard style.
Remember to keep warm when setting foot on the mountain.

travelnotesdivinewill.name: Travel Notes: Divine Will
travelnotesdivinewill.description:
Namecard style.
"Once upon a time, loyal souls did scatter east and west like swan geese." "Today I light my lantern, that they may not lose their way."

travelnotesfadingstar.name: Travel Notes: Fading Star
travelnotesfadingstar.description:
Namecard style.
So long as there is still desire left in your heart, when you hold your head high you will see that which glitters but is not light.

travelnotesflowinghues.name: Travel Notes: Flowing Hues
travelnotesflowinghues.description:
Namecard style.
The luxurious colors flow past — all things are renewed.

travelnotesgrandnarukamishrine.name: Travel Notes: Grand Narukami Shrine
travelnotesgrandnarukamishrine.description:
Namecard style.
The sakura of Mt. Yougou symbolizes the Grand Narukami Shrine.

travelnotesheavenlygeneral.name: Travel Notes: Heavenly General
travelnotesheavenlygeneral.description:
Namecard style.
"You were not created to punish evil. But as to what your purpose is... I fear that I, too, do not know."

travelnotesirodori.name: Travel Notes: Irodori
travelnotesirodori.description:
Namecard style.
Those who share a hobby are known as a group as "fans." Best come up with those stories, everyone, before the kitsune editor-in-chief dreams up copyright law... Or perhaps she has already dreamed it up, but does not altogether mind?

travelnoteslyratum.name: Travel Notes: Lyratum
travelnoteslyratum.description:
Namecard.
Only this flower remains on the heights where all trees have withered.

travelnotesmingxiao.name: Travel Notes: Mingxiao
travelnotesmingxiao.description:
Namecard style.
When everyone's wishes are gathered together, they can light up the long night.

travelnotesmoonchaser.name: Travel Notes: Moonchaser
travelnotesmoonchaser.description:
Namecard style.
May the moonlight wash over you, O pursuer!

travelnotessubspacerecreation.name: Travel Notes: Sub-Space Recreation
travelnotessubspacerecreation.description:
Namecard style.
How many nights have you spent with a stone for your pillow?

travelnoteswindblume.name: Travel Notes: Windblume
travelnoteswindblume.description:
Namecard style.
Who has seen the wind? Neither you nor I. Nor has anyone ever seen love, till a bouquet comes flying by.

ventiazuresky.name: Venti: Azure Sky
ventiazuresky.description:
Namecard style.
The bright blue of a cloudless sky and the melodious tone of Der Frühling complement each other perfectly.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Venti

xianglingfreshfromthepan.name: Xiangling: Fresh from the Pan
xianglingfreshfromthepan.description:
Namecard style.
Try saying this three times fast: "Guoba sears sea snails by Liyue's sea shore."
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Xiangling

xiaomask.name: Xiao: Mask
xiaomask.description:
Namecard style.
He longs for a day to come when he will wear the mask and dance — not to conquer demons, but to the tune of that flute amid a sea of flowers.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Xiao

xingqiurainbow.name: Xingqiu: Rainbow
xingqiurainbow.description:
Namecard style.
Come watch the night rain that brings no rainbow.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Xingqiu

xinyansongsend.name: Xinyan: Song's End
xinyansongsend.description:
Namecard style.
Xinyan only has time to examine her instrument carefully after the performance is over. Even in silence, it is a beauty.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Xinyan

yaemikokitsunedreaming.name: Yae Miko: Kitsune Dreaming
yaemikokitsunedreaming.description:
Namecard style.
Where can Yae Miko's fox form be found? In your dreams, that's where.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship Lv. 10 with Yae Miko

yanfeiimpartial.name: Yanfei: Impartial
yanfeiimpartial.description:
Namecard style.
Justice, signed in scarlet.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship Lv. 10 with Yanfei

yelanthrow.name: Yelan: Throw
yelanthrow.description:
Namecard style.
"Dice are always quite hard to make 'fair.' That goes double for dice with shoddier workmanship. The weighting on each numbered side will almost certainly be unbalanced."
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Yelan

yoimiyaauratusspark.name: Yoimiya: Auratus Spark
yoimiyaauratusspark.description:
Namecard style.
Even momentarily sparks can leave beautiful, unquenchable flames in the hearts of those who watch the night sky.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Yoimiya

yunjinrhyme.name: Yun Jin: Rhyme
yunjinrhyme.description:
Namecard style.
Ms. Yun has two sorts of teachers. The critics of her onstage performances are one, and the books on rhyme she references while writing are the other.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship Lv. 10 with Yun Jin

zhongliplanetbefall.name: Zhongli: Planet Befall
zhongliplanetbefall.description:
Namecard style.
Stars fall, light dims.
source: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Zhongli

abandonedcapitalofhowlingwinds.name: Abandoned Capital of Howling Winds
abandonedcapitalofhowlingwinds.description: The one who once dwelt in that lonely tower is no more. The murmuring winds that shroud the desolate city tell of that most ancient of stories, which no mortal now remembers: they tell of their erstwhile master, the nameless wind sprite, and the chorus that caused the tower to quail...

adropintheocean.name: A Drop in the Ocean
adropintheocean.description: The proud, lonely stone mountains here are said to have been the place where Rex Lapis subdued a great sea monster. They say that those sensitive of heart can sometimes hear a strange, stirring rhythm emanating from deep within the oceanic abyss.

ahomeinthehills.name: A Home in the Hills
ahomeinthehills.description: Mighty Mt. Qingce gently cradles this peaceful village, silently protecting the old, the young, and the abundant croplands within its embrace. The legend of the ancient threat subdued beneath the mountain has been consigned to legend along with those who know of it, never again to return.

ancientthousandwindstemple.name: Ancient Thousand Winds Temple
ancientthousandwindstemple.description: The ruins of an ancient amphitheater. A thousand melodious winds gather here, bringing with them countless tales, and carrying those tales far and wide.

beyondthechasm.name: Beyond the Chasm
beyondthechasm.description: The junction between Liyue Harbor and the great mines of the Chasm. Work has ceased here as of late due a shift deep within the Chasm.

chihurock.name: Chihu Rock
chihurock.description: The ever-pulsating heart of Liyue Harbor that pumps lifeblood into its veins. The lively city scene here is the source of Liyue Harbor's limitless vitality.

crystalfragment.name: Crystal Fragment
crystalfragment.description:
"The crystal that was once here was the very same 'culprit' that caused the closure of The Chasm back then. Its strange movements have again caused the Ministry of Civil Affairs much distress."
"Fortunately, the Traveler was on hand to return it to a place deeper below, leaving us with nothing but this empty, grim hall of stone."

dunyuruins.name: Dunyu Ruins
dunyuruins.description: The Land of Hidden Jade. But the war of ages past is long over, and the mounds of glittering jade have long been destroyed. Now, only the whisper of flowing water remains.

favoniuscathedral.name: Favonius Cathedral
favoniuscathedral.description:
A holy place managed by the devoted adherents of the Anemo Archon.
It was once a palatial estate from which the aristocracy flaunted their authority.

feiyunslope.name: Feiyun Slope
feiyunslope.description: Here live those merchants who have made it. Here, the residents are prosperous and carefree. Here, the lights are bright and never go out.

forgottenswordcemetery.name: Forgotten Sword Cemetery
forgottenswordcemetery.description: Hundreds of years have passed, and the world is once again at peace. This forest of blades stands as testament to the song of clashing swords, the battle-hymns of warriors, the thundering footfalls of monsters, and the crimson sky, as red as blood.

frontlinekannazuka.name: Front Line, Kannazuka
frontlinekannazuka.description: Legend has it that during a disaster hundreds of years ago, Shigeyori Kujou, a mortal general whom Her Highness valued greatly, built a battlefront fortress in just one night and fought valiantly against the forces of darkness, flying the banner of the Electro Mitsudomoe high. Hundreds of years later, the descendants of the Kujou family have also inherited outstanding military engineering skills.

grandnarukamishrinemtyougou.name: Grand Narukami Shrine, Mt. Yougou
grandnarukamishrinemtyougou.description: The Grand Narukami Shrine is located at the peak of Mt. Yougou and is the largest shrine in Inazuma, guarding the Sacred Sakura. It provides much-needed comfort and peace to the people of Inazuma in these unsettling times.

knightsoffavoniuslibrary.name: Knights of Favonius - Library
knightsoffavoniuslibrary.description: The library with the most books in all the northern lands. Other than those collected in the restricted section, all the books here are open for public reading.

landofclearsprings.name: Land of Clear Springs
landofclearsprings.description: A peaceful and idyllic suburban town. It has a long history of hunting, of sweet spring water, and of passing down the legend of a beneficent spirit dwelling within the waters.

manorofdaybreak.name: Manor of Daybreak
manorofdaybreak.description: Filled with the fragrance of grapes and wine, this is the estate of one of Mondstadt's distinguished houses. It has conquered drinkers the city over with its unmatched wines, and is in some ways the holy land to which all who love the bottle must make pilgrimage.

marshofrustlingreeds.name: Marsh of Rustling Reeds
marshofrustlingreeds.description: This is where the sifting of the wavy silvergrass and the croaking of frogs join in song, and it is also the final resting place of many a martial nomad.

mistveiledstoneforest.name: Mist-Veiled Stone Forest
mistveiledstoneforest.description: These stone spires poke out of the clouds like great pavilions. Though this place is forbidden to mortal steps, such a beauteous sight is bound to attract the eyes of those who yearn for the sky, and for those who dwell in adepti realms.

moonlittree.name: Moonlit Tree
moonlittree.description: A strange tree whose branches flow with clear, cold moonlight. Perhaps its roots, which reach deep into the heart of the earth, are connected to something that awaits an opportunity to once again emerge and bask in the moon's light.

mouthofthegreatmine.name: Mouth of the Great Mine
mouthofthegreatmine.description:
"The entrance to The Chasm's mines, known to the miners as 'The Chasm's Maw.' Since the latest earthquake, the tunnels, which were already sealed by the Qixing, have been even more treacherous and inscrutable than ever..."
"But with the Traveler's help, the array sealing the opening has been broken. Let's just hope that the Qixing don't come down too hard on us..."

ninepillarsofpeace.name: Nine Pillars of Peace
ninepillarsofpeace.description: Nine shackles of stone were said to have been laid down deep in the valleys of Cuijue Slope to drive off evil and cleanse the world.

overlookingserpenthead.name: Overlooking Serpent Head
overlookingserpenthead.description: According to legend, the giant serpent that once ventured into the deep sea was finally slain on Yashiori Island. It is also said that when the sea breeze passes through the eyes and sharp fangs of the giant snake, sounds of a whistle will ring in the wind. That is the requiem it composed for itself. Now, this requiem also provides repose for those who have fallen or were displaced in the war.

qingxusforsakentower.name: Qingxu's Forsaken Tower
qingxusforsakentower.description: A ruined tower amid a verdant field. It still stands, defending a bygone age long returned to dust.

riftvalleyyashioriisland.name: Rift Valley, Yashiori Island
riftvalleyyashioriisland.description: According to legend, the blow that brought an end to the serpent god was struck right here. Even to this day, the remnant reverberations of lightning continue to ring across this deep canyon in Yashiori Island, as if the spirits of thunder still chatter about the legendary scene that tore through the sky and the earth thousands of years ago...

ritounarukamiisland.name: Ritou, Narukami Island
ritounarukamiisland.description: Legend has it that hundreds of years ago, Lord Hiiragi Hiroshi of the Kanjou Commission miraculously built a prosperous trade center from a deserted island, and greatly impressed the Shogun. In the days when the Sakoku Decree was in force, the headquarters of the Kanjou Commission still flourished. However, the merchants from faraway nations languished, and the streets were no longer the bustling appearance of a century ago. Perhaps this is the best reflection of the business of mortals: those who become successful overnight will also lose everything in a day.

ruinsofguili.name: Ruins of Guili
ruinsofguili.description: Once, this was a thriving city where a certain flower bloomed in abundance. But all dreams must turn to waking. This earthly paradise was consumed by war, and those who gathered here were once again scattered.

suburbsinazumacity.name: Suburbs, Inazuma City
suburbsinazumacity.description: The outskirts of Inazuma City exude a time-worn and leisurely atmosphere as you make your way up the old paths. It seems that the prosperity of the city has not influenced the scenery here. The power and grace of the Shogun can also be observed here, bringing a quiet and different kind of vitality.

tataraislandsvantagepoint.name: Tatara Islands' Vantage Point
tataraislandsvantagepoint.description: This ring of islands surrounded by jagged, rocky terrain.is the perfect topographic barrier to the Shogunate's smelting facilities. The magnificent giant Blast Furnace here is used to produce a steady stream of high-quality Jade Steel for Inazuma. Recently, however, due to the war, the Mikage Furnace that drove the production has been damaged.

tenryouinazumacity.name: Tenryou, Inazuma City
tenryouinazumacity.description: The many streets and lanes of Tenryou intersect and cross paths, and finally gather in front of the Tenshukaku - the undisputed center of power in Inazuma. Under the eternal and silent gaze of Her Highness, the Ogosho Shogun, the people living in the hustle and bustle of the city will finally be free from the worries of obsession, and move to a paradise where they no longer need to chase and compete for their aspirations — but what is the view of the eternal paradise that the Shogun sees?

theancientbattlefieldoffuaovale.name: The Ancient Battlefield of Fuao Vale
theancientbattlefieldoffuaovale.description:
"This is the site of the deadly battle between Azhdaha and Rex Lapis. I'm just a young and inexperienced adventurer, and writing is not my forte... But I cannot help but stand in awe of this place."
"How small we mortals are before time, which respects neither night nor day, or gods, who can shake heaven and earth..."

theblockedpath.name: The Blocked Path
theblockedpath.description:
"The miners sealed the tunnels that led further within when they dispersed, but they did leave one 'Mountainator' here."
"Perhaps it was the orders of the higher-ups... It's not as if it would be practical to separate Liyue's mercantile pursuits from Glazed Sand Crystal for too long."

thecityofwind.name: The City of Wind
thecityofwind.description: The wind will carry Dandelion Seeds, songs, and stories far afield, and it also guides gentle Travelers to its realm. Welcome to Mondstadt.

thecourtofpillars.name: The Court of Pillars
thecourtofpillars.description:
"Despite the Traveler's warnings, I still followed in {M#his}{F#her} footsteps to arrive at this place."
"I can barely comprehend the sight of this huge sky-blue crystal pillar before me. It cannot be from this continent — only the heavens, with which it shares its shade, could have been its home."
"I have decided to explore deeper within through secret paths to uncover its secrets... I wonder how far I can press on, and what further records I shall leave behind..."

thegreatmushroomsplace.name: The Great Mushroom's Place
thegreatmushroomsplace.description: "An underground cavern where a strange, gigantic mushroom grows. I could've sworn that I heard something strange calling to me. Perhaps it is just an illusion — or a hallucination, in which case this place must be full of poisonous gas, and I must leave as soon as possible."

theinvertedcity.name: The Inverted City
theinvertedcity.description:
"As I was traveling alone, I discovered this vast and terrible ruin. Perhaps this is all that remains of an ancient civilization that was punished and destroyed. This ancient city seems to resist the presence of any outsiders... It might even have something to do with those purple-black crystals, or that mud-like substance."
"I stayed for a time, but I had to leave its ominous, upended silhouette behind."

themarshofcelestialguardians.name: The Marsh of Celestial Guardians
themarshofcelestialguardians.description: A poem says that a star once fell to the earth, forming this lake. But other tales say that even the stars would descend to apprehend this sight, which shines as brightly as the Anemo Archon's eyes.

themoonbatheddeep.name: The Moon-Bathed Deep
themoonbatheddeep.description: The entrance to Enkanomiya. The water in this pool shine year in and year out with light akin to that of the moon, hence the name "Moon-Bathed."

thepearlescentpalace.name: The Pearlescent Palace
thepearlescentpalace.description: This is the center of government and religion alike on Watatsumi Island. Shells and skerries flank the palace in which lie the relics of the serpent god.

thesacredforestinthemoonlight.name: The Sacred Forest in the Moonlight
thesacredforestinthemoonlight.description: Legend has it that in the past, this sacred forest was once home to many demons. To this day, the legend of the "tanuki-bayashi" still surrounds this tranquil woodland.

thesilentfishingvillage.name: The Silent Fishing Village
thesilentfishingvillage.description: The laughter of the old days and the cries of cicadas were at last lost to the thunder. The people of today only remember that this place was abandoned due to the furious, unchecked storms.

thestrandedflagship.name: The Stranded Flagship
thestrandedflagship.description: This rundown atakebune warship was mighty once upon a time. In its remains, marked by starlit tears, one can still vaguely see the image of a vessel proudly sailing, blessed by the shrine maidens and villagers of a bygone age.

theundergroundmines.name: The Underground Mines
theundergroundmines.description:
"I once grew up at the mines of Mingyun Village. The miners' rowdy labor, their joys and sorrows... Those encompassed my entire childhood."
"Looking upon these underground tunnels, far more vast yet silent and deserted, these memories of yesteryear resurface in my mind... albeit sadder and more lonesome."

tidalflatamidsttheflamesofwar.name: Tidal Flat Amidst the Flames of War
tidalflatamidsttheflamesofwar.description: In the ancient language of the Inazuma ancestors, "Nazuchi" means "to be tenderly caressed by the hands of the gods." Ironically, Nazuchi Beach has been ravaged by war since a thousand years ago and has become a place for scavengers and pirates, with few inhabitants.

tsurumiisland.name: Tsurumi Island
tsurumiisland.description:
"Pirka chikappo! Kapatcir kamuy!"
"We slumber together in a spider-silk nest of fog."

undergroundwaterway.name: Underground Waterway
undergroundwaterway.description:
"As I was exploring by myself, I discovered this waterway. The waters here are clean and cool, perfect for taking a break and wash all the ill-fortune accumulated on the way off."
"There are some gentle elemental creatures nearby who move most slowly, rare beings who have no quarrel with the rest of the world... I drew the waterway on the map. I hope the Traveler can follow it and find this place."

viewfromthechasmssurface.name: View from The Chasm's Surface
viewfromthechasmssurface.description:
"When I first came here, the miraculous, terrifying geography silenced me... I have never forgotten the sense of utter awe and respect that I felt."
"But even such wondrous visions became monotonous after too much hustle and bustle on behalf of the Ministry of Civil Affairs..."
"Speaking of which, I must thank the Traveler for helping me continue with my own adventure..."

vigilantguardiansvantagepoint.name: Vigilant Guardians' Vantage Point
vigilantguardiansvantagepoint.description: The inn that stands at the southern end of Dihua Marsh seems to serve as something other than a resting place for guests. They say that Wangshu Inn is a haven for lovers' moonlit rendezvous. Folk stories also have it that even ones as august as the adepti sometimes bask in the moonlight here.

villageofthepeopleofthedeep.name: Village of the People of the Deep
villageofthepeopleofthedeep.description:
An ancient village on Watatsumi Island. It is said that the ancestors of its people came from deep beneath the waves.
It is also an important rallying point for those who are opposed to the Vision Hunt Decree.

weepinggarden.name: Weeping Garden
weepinggarden.description: Legend has it that a deep, pure affection filled this ancient garden, creating the Luhua Pool as it is known today.

wheremerchantsflockandallshipsdock.name: Where Merchants Flock And All Ships Dock
wheremerchantsflockandallshipsdock.description: A prosperous port city where a thousand ships drop anchor. Under the aegis of countless contracts and regulations, innumerable goods change hands and grace the seven nations with their presence. Welcome to Liyue, wayfaring Traveler.

wheremountainspeakbeyondtheclouds.name: Where Mountains Peak Beyond the Clouds
wheremountainspeakbeyondtheclouds.description: They say that the adepti dwell somewhere within these countless towering, cloud-ringed peaks. Few mortals may set foot here.

whereswirlingstormcloudsgather.name: Where Swirling Storm Clouds Gather
whereswirlingstormcloudsgather.description: The great battle where the sea and sky changed color have become lost to time, but the vast storms that were called upon at this time still remain.

wheretheprovisionalheadpriestesslives.name: Where the Provisional Head Priestess Lives
wheretheprovisionalheadpriestesslives.description:
"Hibiki will return."
"The shrine looks wonderful now, thanks to you. She will return very soon."

windsweptwilderness.name: Windswept Wilderness
windsweptwilderness.description: This plain bathes in an everlasting breeze. An ancient, monumental tree left behind by an ancient heroine speaks softly amidst the winds.

yujingterrace.name: Yujing Terrace
yujingterrace.description: Far from the bustling harbor, the Yujing Terrace rises along with Mt. Tianheng. Here, the Qixing and the leaders of many enterprises tirelessly drive Liyue's prosperity and stability.
